choices: Wild Tania and the Squirmy Kid
The Amazing Adventures of Captain Letter
1.content:
Story 1: Battle for the Porcelain Throne
The Prince of Light, Markus, struggles valiantly in his struggle against the Dark Lord Accidentia, across three major campaigns- The Daylight Attack, The Nighttime Struggle, and The Backslide Campaign! But with his trusty defender, "Pull-Upe", will Markus reclaim the Porcelain Throne and the Underwear of Big Kids?
(Markus learns to use the potty, first during the day, then at night, then backsides when his younger brother is born.)

Story 2: Wild Tania and the Squirmy Kid
These two desperados have a dislike of authority and a list of crimes higher'n than they are-attempted and succeded crib and playpen escape, evading a diaper change, extreme exploration and climbing, tantrums, throwing food... But their legend lives on.
(Tania and her twin brother Marty get into a lot of trouble.)

Story 3: Danger in Twilight
Having moved from her old house on Cribvale Drive to Bedding Street, mild-mannered girl Erina has a veritable smorgasbord of things that go bump in the night to deal with.
(Erina, a girl with a hyperactive imagination, deals with moving from a crib to a bed and nightmares.)

Story 4: The Amazing Adventures of Captain Letter
By day, James is a simple boy. But at School, he becomes CAPTAIN LETTER! Defender of the Alphabet, Numbers, and the weak! He does battles with the sinister Mr. Power, a dastardly bully who takes money and toys from all!
(James deals with starting school, learning new things, and bullies- like Roy Powers.)
1.title: The first chapters!

11.content:
The Prince of Light fought three campaigns over the Dark Lord. Which should we focus on?

The Daylight Attack: After becoming aware of the Dark Lord Accidentia and the sinister 'Dia-Pers' he uses, Markus, now aware of his status as the Prince of Light, begins his crusade to stop Accidentia and his minions, the Accidents, from happening. With his guardian "Pulle-Upe" and a replica of his ultimate goal, the Porcelain Throne, he seeks to reclaim the Underwear of Big Kids!

The Nighttime Struggle: With Accidentia seemingly defeated, Markus rests easy, until an Accident is discovered in Markus's home base of Crib. Moving to the safe haven of Bed, Markus contacts Pull-Upe to guard him until he finds out who the new leader of the Accidents are.

The Backslide Campaign: A year had passed since the Nighttime Struggle had finished. With Markus's new brother, Dean, all seemed bright. But then, out of nowhere, the Accidents struck again-and Dean seems responsible for it. Has Accidentia is been revived? Is Pull-Upe required again? And how does Markus's own mental state fit into things?
11.title: Battle for the Porcelain Throne

choices: Aware of the feeling that happened before he peed or pooed.
Aware of the sag and wetness of his diapers when he used them.
Aware of the sad or annoyed looks of his mother and father during a change.
111.content: Markus, was, at first, an ignorant sleeper to the Dia-Pers. He used them like any child his age would, but eventually, that changed. He changed. He became... aware.
111.title: Daylight Attack

choices: He tried to tell his parents about his "awareness".
His father, King Frederick, saw him doing the Dance of the Pee-Pee.
1111.content:
Prince Markus had recently had his second birthday, and he was starting to become aware.
He hadn't paid pooping or peeing much thought, but nowadays, he was starting to become aware of the feeling he had beforehand.

Before he pooped, he would have a pressing sensation in his rear end, and before he peed, he had a feeling coming from his lower abdomen that was very distracting and hard to describe.

One day....
1111.title: Aware of the feeling that happened before he pe...

11112.content:
"Markus? What are you doing?" King Frederick asked one day, as he saw his son squirming in place, holing a hand to his crotch.

Markus then replied...
11112.title: His father, King Frederick, saw him doing the D...

choices: Ask if he wants to use the potty.
111121.content:
"Pee pee," said Markus.
He knew what it felt like when he had to pee and was actively trying to hold it.
What does Fredrick do?
111121.title: ...pee pee.

choices: Frederick asks Markus if he has to pee.
111122.content:
"nuthin'", said Markus.
He didn't know how to put it, and since his diaper wasn't wet right now, he thought it wasn't really a big deal.
What happens now?
111122.title: ...nuthin.

111123.content:
"Uh-oh," said Prince Markus.
"What do you mean uh-oh? What's wrong?" asked King Frederick.
"I need a new Dia-Per," said Markus.
What does King Frederick do?
111123.title: ...uh-oh...

choices: Markus announced that he didn't want to wear diapers again.
Markus's parents, the King and Queen of Light, gave him a potty.
1112.content:
Prince Markus of the Light became aware of the feeling that happened after he used his Dia-Pers, and he didn't like it.

If he'd peed, it would smell bad, sag, and be icky and wet, and while the wetness felt pleasantly warm at first, soon it would feel cold and if he didn't get changed, he would itch.

Pooping felt and smelt even worse!

So, one day...
1112.title: Aware of the sag and wetness of his diapers whe...

choices: ...curiosity. What is this thing? What's it do?
11122.content:
"Markus?" Yelled out his father one day.

Markus ran over to his father and saw him holding a plastic seat-looking object.

"Follow me." Markus follows his father into the bathroom, and he puts down the object, next to that big, white, cold chair.

"This thingy here is called a potty. And now, you're gonna use it."

Markus's first initial emotional reaction was one of...
11122.title: Markus's parents, the King and Queen of Lig...

choices: Frederick teaches Markus about wiping and hand-washing.
Markus wants to use the potty.
111221.content:
"What is this thing?" asked Markus, "What does it do?"
"Well," said King Frederick, "when you have to go poo-poo or pee-pee, you use that instead of a diaper."
What happens now?
111221.title: ...curiosity. What is this thing? What's it...

111222.content:
"It looks kind of scary," said Markus.
"It's not scary at all," said King Frederick, "It's designed just for little kids like you."
Does Markus still find the potty scary?
111222.title: ...nervousness. It looks kind of scary...

choices: Asked his parents why they were in a bad mood.
Decided he didn't want to wear diapers.
1113.content:
It was just another day for the young prince.
He was riding his trusty steed (actually a hobby horse), when he wet his Dia-Per.
"Mommy, Daddy, I need a change!" he announced.
"Oh, not again," said his father, the mighty King Frederick, picking him up and changing Markus.
"Why is Daddy so annoyed?" thought Markus.
Then, he turned his head to notice Queen Odessa, his mother, and she looked-- this was extremely unsettling for Markus--- sad!
Come to think of it, his parents had been a bit negative about his Dia-Per changes for a few weeks now.

So, our brave young hero Markus....
1113.title: Aware of the sad or annoyed looks of his mother...

choices: It was a potty-ahem, a Plastic Throne!
It was some training pants-err, Pull-Upe of the Trainer tribe!
11132.content:
"Don't wanna wear Dia-Pers!" Markus declared!

And that brought a smile to their faces. They nodded at each other before Odessa went to retrieve something-a gift tucked away in a closet from a relative from his birthday.
11132.title: Decided he didn't want to wear diapers.

111321.content:
"Happy second birthday, Markus," said Odessa, holding up a plastic throne.
"What is it?" asked Markus.
"It's a potty," said Frederick, "You use it to go pee-pee or poo-poo instead of a diaper."
What does Markus do now?
111321.title: It was a potty-ahem, a Plastic Throne!

choices: King Frederick gives Markus a potty.
Markus asks what Pull-Upe is for.
111322.content:
"Happy second birthday, Markus!" said Odessa, holding up a pair of training pants.
"What's that?" said Markus.
"It's a pull-up," said Odessa.
"Huh? Pull-Upe?" thought Markus, and that's how Pull-Upe got its name.

What happens now?
111322.title: It was some training pants-err, Pull-Upe of the...

choices: King Frederick, otherwise known as Daddy.
Queen Odessa, otherwise known as Mommy.
112.content:
It had been a month since the Daytime Attack, and Prince Markus of the Light had now defeated Accidentia... or so he thought.
Because one morning, he awoke in his home base of Crib to find the sheets all wet.
An Accident had attacked him in his sleep!
Just then, in walked...
112.title: Nighttime Struggle

choices: Wait until Odessa brings Dean home.
113.content:
Prince Markus, now three years old, was staying with King Frederick's noble brother: Prince "Uncle" Leroy.

Queen Odessa was in the hospital ward, about to give birth to a second prince, and it was a longstanding tradition that the king had to be present for the birth of his offspring, so Markus was left in the temporary custody of Leroy.

Just then, Leroy got a phone call.
When he got off the phone he said, "Good news, champ: your mommy's given birth to a healthy baby boy, and they've named him Dean."

What do they do now?
113.title: Backslide Campaign

choices: Running from Sheriff Mom and Deputy Diaper
The Big Tantrum in High Chair Square
12.content:
Those two had plenty of adventures together... Almost too many to count. But, gotta start somewhere, right?

1. The First Crib Break

2. Running from Sheriff Mom and Deputy Diaper

3. The Big Tantrum in High Chair Square

4. Climbing Mt. Couch
12.title: Wild Tania and the Squirmy Kid

choices: Just after they had been put in their cribs for the night.
Early in the morning, just after the two had woken up.
In the middle of the night.
121.content:
"You never forget your first", they say. While the original meaning was about lovers, that held true for Wild Tania and The Squirmy Kid's first cribbreak.

Now, when did that happen?
121.title: The First Crib Break

1211.content:
Wild Tania and her twin brother Marty, better known as the Squrimy Kid, had just been put in their cribs for the night.
But neither wanted to sleep just yet, they wanted to play!
Only trouble was, they were both in their cribs!
Where do they sleep?
1211.title: Just after they had been put in their cribs for...

1212.content:
It was early morning: nobody was awake.
That is, until Wild Tania and the Squirmy Kid awoke from their slumber.
Do they sleep in the same bedroom?
1212.title: Early in the morning, just after the two had wo...

1213.content:
It was the middle of the night.
Most stories that take place at nighttime begin on a dark, stormy night, but this story is not like most stories.
Firstly, the night was perfectly clear; you could see a great many stars, and secondly, our brave hero and heroine, Wild Tania and her twin brother Marty, or as he was known, the Squirmy Kid, were only two years old.
Everybody in the house was still, until one day, someone woke up. Who?
1213.title: In the middle of the night.

122.content: Who does Sheriff Mom want to change?
122.title: Running from Sheriff Mom and Deputy Diaper

choices: High noon, like all duels... well, closer to 12:45.
Early morning... just after the Kid had woken up.
Late afternoon, when the shadows were long... just before suppertime.
1222.content: What time of day was the change?
1222.title: The Squirmy Kid.

12221.content:
It was 12:45 in the afternoon, and Wild Tania and the Squirmy Kid were playing on the floor.
Just then, Sheriff Mom entered, accompanied by Deputy Diaper.
They were ready for a duel against the Squirmy Kid because he had...
12221.title: High noon, like all duels... well, closer to 12...

12222.content:
It was early in the morning.
Marty, also known as the Squirmy Kid, had just woken up, and Sheriff Mom was entering.
First, she checked his diaper.
She found it was...
12222.title: Early morning... just after the Kid had woken up.

12223.content:
It was late afternoon.
Bartender Dad was making supper, Sheriff Mom was reading a book on the couch, and Wild Tania and the Squirmy Kid were playing on the floor.
Just then, the Squirmy Kid...
12223.title: Late afternoon, when the shadows were long... j...

choices: The Squirmy Kid always had a relaxed face and stood up when he wet.
His diaper turned yellow and sagged.
122231.content:
The Squirmy Kid let loose! Out came a stream of pee into his diaper!

Something tipped Sheriff Mom off to the fact that he was doing this. What was it?
122231.title: Wet his diaper.

1222311.content:
Sheriff Mom was very observant and she could tell when the Squirmy Kid was peeing.

He was learning to hold his pee, so he often waited until he really had to go, so he would often audibly sigh.
Additionally, he had lately seen Bartender Dad standing up to pee and began emulating that (while still wearing a diaper.)

So, she exited the room and reentered it, with her companion Deputy Diaper.

The Squirmy Kid turned tail and ran and Wild Tania...
1222311.title: The Squirmy Kid always had a relaxed face and s...

12223112.content: The Squirmy Kid dashed away to avoid having to be changed. He ran out of the living room and into the hallway, before turning and running into...
12223112.title: Kept playing.

choices: He gives himself away by laughing.
He's lucky--she doesn't open the door... for now.
122231121.content:
The Squirmy Kid then ducked into the broom closet that was in the hallway.
"Marty, where are you?!" said Sheriff Mom.
The Squirmy Kid, of course, didn't reply.
And then...
122231121.title: ...the closet!

choices: Decided to play while he was there.
122231122.content:
The Squirmy Kid then saw the door to the laundry room.
"She'll never find me here," he thought, as he dashed into the laundry room.
When he was there, he...
122231122.title: ...the laundry room!

choices: Ducked into the bedroom closet when he heard footsteps.
Got distracted and decided to root through the drawers.
122231123.content:
He turned and ran into his parents' bedroom.
"Marty!" called Sheriff Mom, but the Squirmy Kid remained stone silent.
He then...
122231123.title: ...Mommy and Daddy's bedroom!

122231124.content:
The Squirmy Kid ran into the bathroom.
What does he do when he's there?
122231124.title: ...the bathroom!

1222312.content:
Sheriff Mom noticed that the Squrimy Kid had peed so much that his diaper turned yellow and sagged.
So, she went and got her accomplice, Deputy Diaper.
The Squirmy Kid ran, so Sheriff Mom ran off in pursuit of him.
What does Wild Tania do?
1222312.title: His diaper turned yellow and sagged.

1222313.content:
Sheriff Mom smelled pee, so she walked over to the twins to see if they had peed.
The Squrimy Kid ran off, knowing he had done it.
Does Wild Tania run away too?
1222313.title: She smelled a uriney smell.

choices: He farted just before he started pooping.
His face turned red and he squatted as he squeezed it out.
122232.content: How did Sheriff Mom realize he was pooping?
122232.title: Messed his diaper.

1222321.content:
The Squirmy Kid farted, then messed his diaper.
However, Sheriff Mom knew that the Squirmy Kid always farted just before pooping, so she ran into the bathroom and came back carrying Deputy Diaper.
The Squirmy Kid took off and ran, and Wild Tania...
1222321.title: He farted just before he started pooping.

1222322.content:
Sheriff Mom could smell poop, so she knew one of her twins needed a new diaper but didn't know which one yet.
She entered, with Deputy Diaper, and the Squirmy Kid bolted.
Did Wild Tania run away too?
1222322.title: She smelled it.

1222323.content:
Sheriff Mom could tell that the Squirmy Kid was pooping, because he always squatted to poop.
This time, his face was turning red as well.
"OK, Marty, time for a diaper change," she said, as she came into the room with Deputy Diaper by her side.
The Squirmy Kid turned tail and ran into...
1222323.title: His face turned red and he squatted as he squee...

choices: Bartender Dad served something Squirmy Kid did not like.
Wild Tania threw food and was told not to, making her mad.
123.content:
It was a typical day at High Chair Square.

Sheriff Mom sat in her chair, Bartender Dad dished out the food, and Wild Tania and the Squirmy kid sat in their high chairs, which gave the square its name.

All was well until something unleashed... the Big Tantrum!

What started the Big Tantrum?
123.title: The Big Tantrum in High Chair Square

124.content:
It was an ordinary day in the city of Living Room.
Too ordinary for Wild Tania and the Squirmy Kid, who were bored out of their minds.
Then, one of them decided to climb Mt. Couch!
Whose idea was it?
124.title: Climbing Mt. Couch

choices: Wild Tania tries to climb out.
The Squirmy Kid tries to open the door.
1251.content:
Sheriff Mom had work to do on her computer, and Bartender Dad was making lunch, so Wild Tania and the Squirmy Kid were left in the custody of St. Playpen.
The only trouble was, they were getting bored of doing the same things over and over, and St. Playpen made it difficult to escape.
Difficult... but not impossible.
What happens?
1251.title: Escaping St. Playpen

1252.content:
Wild Tania and the Squirmy Kid (whose real name was Marty) were very hungry, but their parents had forbidden them from eating any cookies.
There was a local ordinance that clearly stated "No sweets before dinner", and violation of this ordinance was punishable by timeout, which, for anyone as wild and squirmy as these two, was a horrible fate.
There was only one thing for it... they'd have to steal the cookies without getting caught.
Where were the cookies?
1252.title: The Cookie Heist

1253.content:
How about these:

The Great Daycare Revolt:
Every day at daycare, the workers organize an abomination of a period known as Quiet Time. Well, Wild Tania and the Squirmy Kid ain't having none of that. Quiet Time? More like Revolt Time.

The Party Fiasco: Someone at Wild Tania and the Squirmy Kid's daycare is having a birthday party but they're not invited! Time to sneak in.
1253.title: No, somethin' else.

choices: Her parents took her to look at the available houses on Bedding Street.
She decided she wanted to move to Bedding Street.
Her house on Cribvale Drive was needed by a newcomer, so she had to move out.
Her parents told her that she would be moving to Bedding Street soon.
She just suddenly found out that she now lived on Bedding Street.
13.content:
Erina was a mild-mannered little girl.
She was only three, but she had an enormous imagination!
She lived on Cribvale Drive, but one day....
13.title: Danger in Twilight

choices: Playing at home, the day before kindergarten.
14.content:
James was very excited.
He was four years old, and was just about to start kindergarten.
At kindergarten, he'd meet all kinds of new friends and learn how to read, count, and do all sorts of cool stuff.
Right now, he was...
14.title: The Amazing Adventures of Captain Letter

15.content:
How about these?

Story 5-The Trip to Prescholandia
Markus, having more or less conquered Accidentia, has now been prepared to take extended stays in the land of Prescholandia. There he must learn new concepts, get accustomed the the Porcelain and Plastic Thrones there, anre more.
(Markus goes to preschool, learns basic math and the alphabet, has to learn to use public toilets, sharing, etc)

Story 6-The Bare Bandit
Tony is a free spirited kid. However, this often results in him having to run from the authorities for streaking.
(Ala the Naked Tommy episode of Rugrats, Tony often streaks)

Story 7-The Changeling
Young Sara is a Changeling, who rarely shapeshifts out of her preffered form, and the only thing she hates being changed out of, is her diapers.
(Sara is rarely without a costume of some sort, and is always trying to run away whenever a diaper change is announced)
15.title: Other

choices: A New Throne, An Old Foe
151.content:
What aspects should we focus on of Markus's trips to Prescholandia?

1. The Magistrates

The most powerful wizards of Prescholandia, Master Diane and Master Hector, teach the young Markus and his compatriots the magics of Arithmetic and Spelling.

2. A New Throne, An Old Foe

While Markus gets used to the new Porcelain and Plastic thrones, he realizes that some sinister remains of Accidentia lurk in the shadows-especially at naptime. Some of his fellow students even still require assistance from others of Pull-Upe's tribe, the Trainers.
151.title: Story 5

1511.content:
It had been a month since the Backslide Campaign, and Markus had been having extended stays at Prescholandia with other youths.
Prince Dean, however, was still too young.
Every day, Markus and the others would be tutored by the most powerful wizards of Prescholandia: Master Diane and Master Hector.
Right now, Markus was learning the magics of...
1511.title: The Magistrates

1512.content: Markus was slowly learninng the ways of both the Porcelain and Plastic Thrones the land of Prescholandia had. However, the remnants of Accidentia's forces had snuck in, especially at nap time. As Prince Markus awoke from one such nap, he found his undies were...
1512.title: A New Throne, An Old Foe

choices: Master Diane took him to the secret Changing Station kept in the back.
Master Hector found Markus and took him to have his clothes cleaned.
15121.content:
Markus had been Accidented! Markus looked at his soaked pants and undies with shock. This hadn't happened since the Backslide Campaign!

As he stood up, he looked for one of the Magistrates for assistance. But as he looked at the sleeping and waking up compatriots of his, he notices some semi-familiar faces-Trainers? None of them were *his*, none were Pull-Upe, but they were noticeable.

Eventually, one of the Masters noticed Markus's predicament.
15121.title: Wet

151211.content:
"Let's sort you out," said Master Diane, picking up Markus.
She carried him into a room in the back of the class, called the Changing Station.
First, she asked him to take off his pants, shoes, socks, and undies.
He did, and Master Diane wiped him off.
When that was over, she handed him a new pair of pants and...
151211.title: Master Diane took him to the secret Changing St...

choices: No, he let him go commando.
No, he gave him a Dia-Per or Trainer.
151212.content:
Master Hector found Markus and picked him up, carrying him into a secret room.
"You sit here and play with this," said the wizard, handing him a toy truck, and putting the bedding and wet clothes into a washing machine.
While the clothes and bedding were being washed, Markus got handed some wipes, so he could wipe himself up.
Then, Master Hector found him a pair of pants to wear while his own pants washed.
Did he give him underwear?
151212.title: Master Hector found Markus and took him to have...

choices: Master Diane brings another kid to wash their clothing.
Master Diane brings in a kid with a wet Dia-Per.
Master Diane brings in a kid with a wet Trainer.
1512121.content:
"Hey, it's okay, kid. Accidents happen."

Master Hector smiled and patted Markus on the head. This gave Markus some relief.
1512121.title: Yes.

choices: Sir Larry, knight of the alphabet (so-called as he knows the whole alphabet).
15121211.content:
As Markus was changing into new pants and underwear, Master Diane brought in another child who'd wet their pants.
This child's name was...
15121211.title: Master Diane brings another kid to wash their c...

choices: His rival Sandra the Dark Princess.
15121212.content:
Master Diane then entered as Markus was changing into his new clothes.
With her was another kid who had peed during nap time, but this one was in a Dia-Per.
This kid was....
15121212.title: Master Diane brings in a kid with a wet Dia-Per.

choices: Max, who he'd already known before coming to Prescholia.
15121213.content:
Master Diane then entered, bringing in another kid who had peed during nap time.
This one was in a Trainer, but it was not Pull-Upe.
The kid was...
15121213.title: Master Diane brings in a kid with a wet Trainer.

15122.content:
Boom boom.

Markus had made a boom boom.

In his Big Kid Undies.

During his nap.

He felt shame and rage at this feat, at having an Accident into his bed in this new land-until he noticed others having woken up with Accidents as well. Some wet, some dirty.

Some were even in... Dia-Pers? But they had been in undies just this morning!

Others, suprisingly, had Trainers guarding them.

As the Magistrates swept through the room, taking some to be cleaned, one picked up Markus.
15122.title: Messy

151221.content:
Hector picked up Markus and Diane picked up another boy, wearing a wet Dia-Per, named Billy.
As Diane cleaned Billy, Hector took Markus's undies off and put them in a bucket of water to soak.
Then, he began to wipe Markus.
As for Markus's pants...
151221.title: It was Hector.

151222.content:
Diane took Markus up to be cleaned, while Hector took Alyssa, a young girl in a Trainer.
Diane took off Markus's dirty undies and put them in a bucket of water to soak.
Then, she inspected his pants. They were...
151222.title: It was Diane.

15123.content:
Markus blushed in embarrassment.
His undies were both wet *and* messy. Was Accidentia invincible?
He looked around and saw that some of his companions were in Trainers.
He didn't see Pull-Upe among them, but there they were.
Just then, someone took Markus to clean him up.
Who was it?
15123.title: Wet and Messy

1513.content:
How about these?

The Boo-Boo Incident.
Markus gets a boo-boo while playing on the playground.

A New Nemesis
Markus deals with Robert, a boy who is mean to him.
1513.title: Other.

choices: Wait, no, there were others, let me think...
152.content: Tony's exploits are well-known from here to there, as the lawless Bare Bandit. Why, let me tell you of his most famous tales.
152.title: Story 6

choices: Both his parents, and any siblings if he's got them.
1521.content: One day, Tony was at the shopping mall with...
1521.title: The Mall Streaking

15211.content:
Sheriff Mommy had gone out to grab some groceries.

The Bare Bandit managed to slip away from her and begin stripping.

First, his shirt came off. Then his shoes, and socks. His pants were gone after that, and finally, he stripped off his...
15211.title: His mom.

choices: The Bare Bandit runs into a security guard.
The Bare Bandit meets another kid his age.
152111.content:
Finally, Tony, aka the Bare Bandit, stripped off his diaper.
"Tony! Put your clothes back on at once!" said Sheriff Jane "Mommy" Anderson, but the Bare Bandit had already run off down the pet food aisle, buck naked.
Sheriff Mommy picked up her son's discarded clothes and chased after him.
What happens now?
152111.title: ...diaper.

choices: He saw shelves and wanted to climb them.
152112.content:
Once his Pull-Up was off, the Bare Bandit was ready to begin his streak.
"Tony!" called Sheriff Mommy, but the Bare Bandit didn't answer: he was far too busy streaking to bother with going back to his mom.
He ran until...
152112.title: ...Pull-Up.

1521121.content: The Bare Bandit kept on running, until eventually, he felt a need to pee. What does he do?
1521121.title: He had to pee.

choices: A security guard sees him peeing.
Sheriff Mommy catches up to him.
15211211.content:
The Bare Bandit decided to just pee on the floor.
He was too distracted to care about other people having to clean it up.
What happens now?
15211211.title: Pee where he is

15211212.content:
Even though Tony was the Bare Bandit, he had reservations.
He didn't want to wet the floor lest someone step in it; he had quite a logical mind for such a young boy.
So, he decided to find somewhere else to pee.
Where does he pee?
15211212.title: Find a place to pee

15211213.content:
Tony decided to head to the potty and resume his escapades as the Bare Bandit afterwards.
Does he know where the potty is?
15211213.title: Head to the potty

154.content:
Story 8- The Incredible Growing Baby.

Yours truly a monstrously obese baby boy is about to get bigger and fatter as I go on an eating rampage and invade a pool party as I'll get bigger and fatter as well until I become the size of a building or skyscraper and wreak havoc upon an entire unsuspecting city and or eat everything in sight as well.
(Weight Gain and Height Gain, big unsuspecting city being invaded by a giant hungry baby complete with a big city being destroyed and devoured by a giant baby boy on the loose complete with people fleeing in utter and sheer terror)
154.title: Other

choices: The "city" is only made of blocks and he's pretending to get bigger.
He is looking for snacks at a pool party.
1541.content: OK, but how do we make this a *normal* toddler thing, just dramatized?
1541.title: Story 8-The Incredible Growing Baby.

choices: Invade the town and or city itself.
15412.content:
It all started one beautiful sunny day at a pool party that was already underway at a public swimming pool located somewhere in Los Angeles California U.S.A.

You see I was wearing a pair of red white and blue swimming trunks along with a Huggies Little Swimmers swim diaper with the Paw Patrol logo on the front end and sides of the swim diaper along with a picture of the Paw Patrol's pups on the rear end of the swim diaper.

It was at that moment that I saw a lot of delicious yet tasty treats that sadly I wasn't able to eat as I just wasn't old enough to eat any of those snacks that I myself had seen.

But I then thought to myself "What if I was to imagine myself as that of a big monstrously fat anthropomorphic baby version of one of the Paw Patrol's male pups in other words Rubble the bulldog who doesn't have to wear any big huge or giant sized baby clothes or Huggies little movers or ultra trim diaper which I can take off at any time along with wearing a big huge or giant sized pair of swimming trunks and a big huge or giant sized Huggies or Pampers swim diaper which I can also take off as well as I can also get at least bigger and fatter by eating and drinking everything in sight, yeah that's it I'll imagine myself in a fantasy situation right now." I happily thought to myself as I started imagining myself in my fantasy situation.

As soon as my fantasy situation started I was but no longer human as I was now a big monstrously fat anthropomorphic baby version of Paw Patrol's Rubble the bulldog as I was now wearing a slightly bigger pair of red white and blue swimming trunks along with a now larger version of Huggies little swim diaper in other words Huggies big monstrously fat swimmers swim diaper as I spotted the very public pool where the pool party itself was located.

"Goo goo gaga ooh goody me incredible growing baby always wanted to invade a pool party as me see lots and lots of food and snacks for me to eat or gobble and slowly get bigger and fatter along with a baby pool for me to drink out of along with a big monstrously fat baby pool made for big monstrously fat babies who want to swim bare butt naked as me incredible growing baby no have to wear a big huge or giant size pair of swimming trunks and or big Huggies monstrously fat swimmer swim diaper. Now me incredible growing baby eat lots and lots of food and drink from baby pool then me incredible growing baby go for big monstrously fat baby swim bare butt naked." I said as I giant stepped my way over towards the public pool itself as everyone started fleeing for their lives as I then spotted all those snacks and food.

"Ooh me incredible growing baby see lots and lots of food and snacks,me incredible growing baby make way over to lots and lots of food and grow bigger and fatter." I said as I made my way over to where all the food and snacks were at as I began eating everything in sight as I slowly started getting bigger and fatter as I then finished everything off.

*Burp* "Me incredible growing baby say excuse me" I said as I then eyed a baby pool that I could drink out of and slowly become bigger and fatter as well.

"Ooh goody me incredible growing baby see baby pool for me to drink out of and slowly get bigger and fatter as well." I said as I giant stepped over to where the little baby pool was at as I picked up the entire little baby pool itself with my incredible growing baby strength.

"Me incredible growing baby say bottoms up." I said as I started drinking and gulped down all of the water that was in the baby pool itself as I once again slowly grew bigger and fatter as I then put the baby pool back where it belonged as I then noticed I already was now slightly bigger and fatter than before as I still had a ways to go before I reached a giant fat size.

"Ooh me incredible growing baby slowly grew bigger and fatter but me incredible growing baby has still got a ways to go before me incredible growing baby become a giant fat baby." I said.

At that moment I then eyed the big pool also known as the big monstrously fat baby pool itself.

"Now me incredible growing baby will go for big monstrously fat baby swim but first me incredible growing baby take off swimming trunks and Huggies big monstrously fat swimmers swim diaper." I said.

I first took off my pair of swimming trunks which landed on the ground with a heavy thud, as I then took off my Huggies big monstrously fat swimmers swim diaper which also hit the ground with a heavy thud as well, as I then breathed a big sigh of relief.

"Me incredible growing baby feel much better already." I said as I breathed a sigh of relief. "Now me incredible growing baby giant make way over to big monstrously fat baby pool and giant step into the pool as well." I said as I then made my way over to the big monstrously fat baby pool and giant stepped my way down into the big monstrously fat baby pool as I flattened the stairs leading into the pool.

At that moment I thought of something else I should do as I then decided I was going to....
15412.title: He is looking for snacks at a pool party.

154121.content:
Of course, young Raymond wasn't really getting fat, so he couldn't actually invade the city.
He was imagining himself invading the city while...
154121.title: Invade the town and or city itself.

choices: The giant fat baby starts eating the city itself.
1541211.content:
As I the incredible growing baby had climbed out of the big monstrously fat baby pool itself, the scent of greasy delicious fast food itself filled the air as I smelled the scent of greasy delicious fast food itself as I then reminded myself of what I was going to eat and or gobble.

"Me incredible growing baby smell greasy delicious fast food, now me incredible growing baby will heavily waddle me way towards greasy delicious fast food and slowly grow bigger and fatter. Me incredible growing baby heavily waddle over to nearest restaurant in the city of Los Angeles and eat everything in sight and slowly grow bigger and fatter as well." I said as I started to heavily waddle towards the nearest restaurant in Los Angeles.

Meanwhile at a nearby Golden Corral restaurant in Los Angeles city everyone who was there at the Golden Corral restaurant was having the time of their lives until the sound of giant footsteps that not only made the ground rumble but also everything else shake rattle and roll could be heard as the restaurant's customers looked at the windows to able to see what was going on outside as they saw me the incredible growing baby coming towards the restaurant itself as they started to panic and evacuate the restaurant itself along with the restaurant's staff as well as I the incredible growing baby had heavily waddled into the restaurant itself as there was lots of food and desserts for me to eat and gobble everything in sight.

"Me incredible growing baby say it's chow time for me." I said as I began to heavily waddle over to where all the food was at as I started eating and gobbling everything in sight as I started to once again slowly grow bigger and fatter as there was no food left to eat and gobble until I saw all sorts of desserts for me to eat and gobble that happened to be right from where I was at.

"Ooh me incredible growing baby eat and gobble desserts, me incredible growing baby eat desserts." I said as I heavily waddled over to where the desserts were at as I began eating and gobbling every dessert item there was in sight as I once again started to slowly grow bigger and fatter as I then figured I should eat some more desserts in other words ice cream.

"Me incredible growing baby eat more desserts, me incredible growing baby want to have some ice cream in fact me incredible growing baby heavily waddle towards nearest ice cream parlor in Los Angeles." I said as I had made my way towards a wall that I plowed through as I was now at least bigger than the room I was in as I started to giant step towards the nearest ice cream parlor in the city.

Later at an ice cream parlor in the city everything was but normal until I the incredible growing baby arrived as I made my way inside and began eating and gobbling everything in sight as I slowly grew bigger and fatter until I the incredible growing baby had outgrown the ice cream parlor itself as I was now a giant fat baby.

"Ooh me incredible growing baby outgrow ice cream parlor, now me incredible growing baby want to eat and gobble big city of Los Angeles." I said.
1541211.title: Running away from the pool.

15412111.content:
Since he's not really giant and fat, he can only imagine himself eating the city.
In actuality, he's...
15412111.title: The giant fat baby starts eating the city itself.

choices: They try to talk down their enemy.
They settle it with a wrestling match or a pageant and competition.
154121111.content:
He himself was devouring both buildings and skyscrapers in Los Angeles city as the citizens of Los Angeles were already in a panic as their city was being eaten as they needed a hero or a group of heroes brave and heroic enough to come save their beloved city of Los Angeles.

Meanwhile outside of Los Angeles city there happened to be four giant fat animated anthropomorphic superhero babies who immediately realized that Los Angeles was being devoured as they all knew this was a job for Universe Reindeer which happened to be Donner's heroic alter ego, Blitzen Kong in other words Blitzen's heroic alter ego, Captain Cookbook Pluto the dog's heroic alter ego and their superhero team's leader, and Super Cat mainly Harold the cat's alter ego as Harold was featured in the Garfield rap music video as his facial expressions went from that of being calm cool and collected to that of being plain downright bonkers.

At that point all four giant fat animated anthropomorphic superhero babies started to heavily stomp their way towards downtown Los Angeles as they soon enough arrived in downtown Los Angeles city as the citizens had cheered and applauded for their city's own team of superheroes as all four heroes reassured the citizens themselves that they would save the city and put a stop to whoever was eating the city of Los Angeles.

"Now that we're in downtown Los Angeles what's our next move Captain Cookbook?" Universe Reindeer asked.

"Okay guys here's what we're going to do, now we can either talk this incredible growing baby down and try to at the very least get him to stop eating the city of Los Angeles or if it comes down to it we'll have to either take on this incredible growing baby in a 4 on 1 wrestling match outside the city of Los Angeles or we could all settle this by having a giant fat animated anthropomorphic baby modeling pageant as we'll not only show off all our fat and muscular giant animated anthropomorphic selves by doing poses for the audience as well but we'll also have a strength based competition whereas it'll consist of 5 events that will test our strengths which also includes weightlifting as well." Captain Cookbook explained.

"That sounds like a good move as I'm all for that." Blitzen Kong said.

"After all we're the only ones who can save the city of Los Angeles of course, in other words let's do it Captain Cookbook." Super Cat said.

Now what will happen next?
154121111.title: Reader's choice 1.

1541211111.content:
He wasn't really eating L.A.
He's just imagining everything, remember.
Now who are these people in real life?
1541211111.title: They try to talk down their enemy.

Meanwhile, back in reality, Raymond wasn't really getting fat.
He'd taken his shorts and swim diaper off and ran out of the paddling pool.
Then, he'd ran into the street and into a nearby KFC and ice cream parlor.
Several people were wondering about the identity of the little boy and saying things like, "No, boy! You must not touch the food!" (This is what he integrated into his fantasy as "panicking and evacuating.")
What happens now?

1542.content:
(This story is about *everyday* toddler struggles and events, dramatized remember.)

Sadie vs the Dark: a timid little girl named Sadie tries to overcome her fear of the dark.

Dennis and the Beast: Little Dennis doesn't know what to do when his parents bring home a strange creature called a cat.

Captain Craig and First Mate Freda: Two kids named Craig and Freda play pirates in the yard.

1543.title: Open Choice Chapter

info.brief_description: Stories of everyday toddler struggles and events... Dramatized!
info.description: Follow the journey and lives of several ordinary toddlers, flavored with other genres. Learning to use the potty is an epic struggle against a Dark Lord! A squirmy diaper change is a getaway from a sheriff in the Wild West. A crib escape is a prison break! And so much more!
